item.title: 特朗普表示愿意就关税问题达成协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他对与寻求避免美国关税的国家达成交易持开放态度，但这些协议必须在他的政府于4月2日宣布对等关税之后再进行谈判。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that he was open to carving out deals with countries seeking to avoid U.S. tariffs but those agreements would have to be negotiated after his administration announces reciprocal tariffs on April 2.】

item.title: 合规主管称瑞银无意离开瑞士
item.description: 瑞银合规与治理主管马库斯-朗纳（Markus Ronner）周五表示，瑞银没有离开瑞士的计划，因为瑞士正在讨论如何监管这家瑞士最大的银行。【原文：UBS has no plans to leave Switzerland, the bank's compliance and governance chief Markus Ronner said on Friday amid a debate on how to regulate the country's biggest lender.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，联邦调查局正在调查甲骨文公司的网络攻击事件
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引一位熟悉此事的人士的话报道，联邦调查局正在调查甲骨文公司的网络攻击事件，因为黑客侵入了这家云计算公司的计算机系统并窃取了病人的数据。【原文：The Federal Bureau of Investigation is probing the cyberattack at Oracle as the hackers broke into the cloud computing company's computer systems and stole patient data, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，Scale AI 在潜在要约收购中寻求高达 250 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据《商业内幕》（Business Insider）周五援引多个消息来源报道，人工智能初创公司 Scale AI 正在潜在的要约收购中寻求高达 250 亿美元的估值，因为它希望利用对该技术的蓬勃需求。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Scale AI is seeking a valuation as high as $25 billion in a potential tender offer as it looks to capitalize on the booming demand for the technology, Business Insider reported on Friday, citing multiple sources.】

item.title: OpenAI 必须在年底前完成营利转型，才能筹集到 400 亿美元的全部资金
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士周五表示，OpenAI 必须在今年年底前转型为一家营利性公司，以确保获得由软银牵头的 400 亿美元全额融资，该公司的融资已进入最后阶段。【原文：OpenAI must transition to a for-profit company by the end of the year to secure the full $40 billion funding led by SoftBank it is in the final stages of raising, a person familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克必须就披露 Twitter 股份一事面对欺诈诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官周五驳回了亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）要求驳回一项诉讼的请求，马斯克声称，他在披露对社交媒体公司推特（现名 X）的初始投资时等待了太长时间，从而欺骗了推特的前股东。【原文：A U.S. judge on Friday rejected billionaire Elon Musk's bid to dismiss a lawsuit claiming he had defrauded former Twitter shareholders by waiting too long to disclose his initial investment in the social media company, now known as X.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 以 450 亿美元收购社交媒体平台 X
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周五表示，他的 xAI 已经以 450 亿美元（包括债务）的全股票交易收购了社交媒体应用程序 X，该应用程序的前身是 Twitter。【原文：Elon Musk said on Friday that his xAI has acquired X, the social media app formerly known as Twitter, in an all-stock transaction for $45 billion, including debt.】

item.title: 独家报道：Blackstone 评估入股美国 TikTok 分拆公司
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士透露，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 正在评估对 TikTok 的美国业务进行少量少数股权投资。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone is evaluating taking a small minority investment in TikTok's U.S. operations, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 白宫官员称特朗普赦免了 BitMEX 联合创始人
item.description: 一位白宫官员周五表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普已赦免了加密货币交易所 BitMEX 的三位联合创始人。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has pardoned the three co-founders of cryptocurrency exchange BitMEX, a White House official said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国称中国对巴拿马港口协议不满 "并不意外
item.description: 美国国务院周五表示，对香港企业集团长江和记（0001.HK）向贝莱德领导的集团出售巴拿马运河附近两个港口业务的交易引起中国不满 "并不感到意外"，此前中国市场监管部门表示将对该交易进行反垄断审查。【原文：The U.S. State Department said on Friday it was "not surprised" that China would be upset by Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison's (0001.HK) deal to sell its two port operations near the Panama Canal to a BlackRock-led group, after China's market regulator said it would conduct an antitrust review of the deal.】

item.title: 汽车制造商警告特朗普新关税将增加成本、削减汽车销量
item.description: 代表通用汽车公司（General Motors）、丰田汽车公司（Toyota）、大众汽车公司（Volkswagen）和其他主要汽车制造商的一个团体警告说，唐纳德-特朗普总统计划下周对进口汽车征收的25%的新关税将损害美国消费者的利益。【原文：A group representing General Motors Toyota , Volkswagen and other major automakers warned new 25% tariffs President Donald Trump plans to impose next week on imported vehicles will hurt U.S. consumers.】

item.title: 多米尼克能源公司削减首席执行官的现金薪酬，以实现长期目标
item.description: 多米尼恩能源公司首席执行官罗伯特-布鲁（Robert Blue）在该公司 2022-2024 年的股东回报和运营利润未能达到业绩目标后，错过了获得 400 多万美元现金的机会。【原文：Dominion Energy CEO Robert Blue missed out on taking home more than $4 million in cash after the utility's shareholder return and operating profit during 2022-2024 failed to meet performance targets.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数万名美国用户的 Musk's X 出现故障
item.description: 根据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 的数据，周五埃隆-马斯克的 X 在美国有数万名用户遭遇故障。【原文：Elon Musk's X was down for tens of thousands of users in the U.S. on Friday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 欧洲卫星公司就合并计划与欧盟进行初步谈判 - 消息来源
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五透露，欧洲航空航天公司空中客车、泰雷兹和莱昂纳多已开始与欧盟反垄断监管机构就可能合并其卫星业务进行初步谈判。【原文：European aerospace companies Airbus , Thales and Leonardo have started preliminary talks with European Union antitrust regulators over a possible merger of their satellite businesses, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 被摩根大通收购的初创公司创始人查理-贾维斯在欺诈案审判中被判有罪
item.description: 周五，企业家查理-贾维斯（Charlie Javice）被判犯有诈骗罪，摩根大通在 2021 年 7 月以 1.75 亿美元的价格收购了她的大学财务援助初创公司 Frank。【原文：Entrepreneur Charlie Javice was convicted on Friday of defrauding JPMorgan Chase into buying her college financial aid startup Frank for $175 million in July 2021.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会开始调查迪斯尼和美国广播公司的多元化做法
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）负责人周五表示，他正在对沃尔特-迪斯尼公司（Walt Disney）及其美国广播公司（ABC）的多元化做法展开调查，称这些做法可能违反了美国平等就业机会法规。【原文：The head of the Federal Communications Commission on Friday said he is opening an investigation into the diversity practices of Walt Disney and its ABC unit, saying they may violate U.S. equal employment opportunity regulations.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 批准赛诺菲出血性疾病疗法
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周五表示，美国食品和药物管理局批准了法国制药商赛诺菲的疗法，为12岁及12岁以上患有罕见疾病的患者提供新型治疗铺平了道路，这种疾病会阻碍血液正常凝固。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved French drugmaker Sanofi's therapy, paving the way for a new type of treatment for patients 12 years of age and older with a rare disorder that prevents blood from clotting properly, the regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉 PDVSA 因电力危机恶化将缩短办公时间
item.description: 路透社看到的一份内部文件显示，委内瑞拉国营石油公司 PDVSA 将缩短行政人员的办公时间，这是在电力危机日益恶化的情况下，政府下达节能命令之后采取的措施。【原文：Venezuelan state-run oil firm PDVSA will cut office hours for its administrative workers, an internal document seen by Reuters showed, following an energy-saving order by the government amid a worsening power crisis.】

item.title: 独家报道美联储戴利：通胀进展平平，减弱降息信心
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周五表示，当天早些时候公布的通胀数据证实了她对今年降息两次是 "合理 "预测这一基线预期的信心下降。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Friday said inflation data published earlier in the day confirms her decreased confidence in her baseline expectation that two interest rate cuts this year are a "reasonable" projection.】

item.title: Unipol 主席暗示荷兰国际集团（ING）可能正在研究松德里奥人民银行（Popolare di Sondrio）的竞购方案
item.description: Unipol 董事长 Carlo Cimbri 周五表示，一家外国银行正在研究对 Popolare di Sondrio 的潜在竞购，以与意大利 BPER 银行的竞购相抗衡。【原文：Unipol Chairman Carlo Cimbri said on Friday a foreign bank was studying a potential bid for Popolare di Sondrio to rival the one unveiled by Italy's BPER Banca .】

item.title: 德国财长警告关税将打击美国和德国经济
item.description: 德国财政部长约尔格-库基斯（Joerg Kukies）周五警告说，美国的关税将打击德国和美国的经济，柏林正在努力防止贸易战升级。【原文：Germany's Finance Minister Joerg Kukies warned on Friday that U.S. tariffs would hit both the German and the U.S. economies and that Berlin was working to prevent an escalating trade war.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，收购公司、航空航天公司接近以 80 多亿美元收购波音导航部门
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，几家私募股权公司和至少一家航空航天供应商都在剩余的竞标者之列，争相以超过 80 亿美元的价格收购波音公司的杰普逊导航部门。【原文：Several private equity firms and at least one aerospace supplier are among the remaining bidders competing to buy Boeing's Jeppesen navigation unit for more than $8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝克休斯称美国钻井商三周来首次削减石油和天然气钻井平台
item.description: 美国能源服务公司贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周五在其密切关注的报告中称，美国能源公司本周削减了石油和天然气钻井平台的数量，这是三周以来能源公司首次削减钻井平台数量。【原文：U.S. energy firms this week cut the number of oil and natural gas rigs operating for the first time in three weeks energy, services firm Baker Hughes said in its closely followed report on Friday.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 CoreWeave 首次上市股价下跌近 3
item.description: CoreWeave 的股票周五在纳斯达克的开盘价比首次公开发行价低近 3%。【原文：CoreWeave's shares opened nearly 3% below their initial public offering price on the Nasdaq on Friday.】

item.title: 在美国征收对等关税之前，特朗普 4 月 1 日的贸易报告有哪些内容？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周三宣布对等关税，这一备受瞩目的消息将部分基于他的贸易、商务和财政部门主管周二提交的综合报告，以全面审查美国的贸易政策。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's hotly anticipated reciprocal tariff announcement on Wednesday will be based in part on consolidated reports due on Tuesday from his trade, Commerce and Treasury chiefs to thoroughly review U.S. trade policy.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）表示，银行可以在未经事先批准的情况下从事加密货币活动
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）周五表示，受该机构监管的机构在开展允许的加密货币相关活动时无需事先获得批准。【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp said on Friday that institutions supervised by the agency do not need to get prior approval for permissible crypto-related activities.】

item.title: 支出疲软、物价高企、通胀预期升温对美联储不利
item.description: 随着消费者对支出的谨慎态度开始与新的通胀风险和通胀预期的再次飙升相吻合，美国联邦储备局似乎已经锁定的软着陆之路可能会变得更加复杂。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve's seemingly locked-in path to a soft landing, already roiled by the arrival of the Trump administration, may be growing even more complicated as evidence of consumer caution about spending starts to align with new inflation risks and another jump in inflation expectations.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织确认与阿根廷就 200 亿美元计划进行谈判
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周五证实，正如阿根廷政府周四宣布的那样，该组织正在与阿根廷商讨的计划被要求提供 200 亿美元，而且该计划将是一项扩展基金机制（EFF）。【原文：The International Monetary Fund confirmed on Friday that the program it is discussing with Argentina was requested to be for $20 billion, as announced Thursday by the Argentine government, and that it will be an Extended Fund Facility (EFF).】

item.title: 海湾注入现金后，库什纳的 Affinity 公司资产跃升至 48 亿美元
item.description: 根据一份监管文件，贾里德-库什纳（Jared Kushner）的投资公司 Affinity Partners 在获得包括卡塔尔主权财富基金在内的中东投资者的现金注资后，去年管理的资产猛增 60%，达到 48 亿美元。【原文：Jared Kushner's investment company Affinity Partners saw assets under management jump 60% last year to $4.8 billion, according to a regulatory filing, after it received a cash injection from Middle East investors including Qatar's sovereign wealth fund.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普关税逼近，汽车制造商权衡涨价风险
item.description: 业内消息人士称，欧洲汽车制造商正试图制定价格上涨的幅度，以应对迫在眉睫的美国进口关税，他们担心任何先行者都有可能遭到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的反击。【原文：European carmakers are trying to work out how much their prices might have to rise in response to looming U.S. import tariffs, industry sources said, fearing any first-movers could risk a backlash from U.S. President Donald Trump.】
